description: Write a method called `isPalindrome(String s)` that returns true if the string reads the same forwards and backwards, false otherwise.
output_specification: Expected output format will be shown.
sample_inputs: ['A man a plan a canal Panama']
explanations: 'racecar' reads the same forwards and backwards
'hello' does not read the same both ways
Empty string is considered a palindrome
notes: Palindromes read the same forwards and backwards
Empty strings and single characters are palindromes

input: A man a plan a canal Panama
